mapper.select: select id, schedule_id, worktime_id, employee_id, work_start_time, work_end_time, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from rider_schedule where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into rider_schedule(schedule_id, worktime_id, employee_id, work_start_time, work_end_time, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{scheduleId}, #{worktimeId}, #{employeeId}, #{workStartTime}, #{workEndTime}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy})

insert into rider_schedule(schedule_id, worktime_id, employee_id, work_start_time, work_end_time, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.scheduleId}, #{entity.worktimeId}, #{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.workStartTime}, #{entity.workEndTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})

insert into rider_schedule(schedule_id, worktime_id, employee_id, work_start_time, work_end_time, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.scheduleId}, #{entity.worktimeId}, #{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.workStartTime}, #{entity.workEndTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})
on duplicate key update schedule_id = values(schedule_id), worktime_id = values(worktime_id), employee_id = values(employee_id), work_start_time = values(work_start_time), work_end_time = values(work_end_time), create_time = values(create_time), create_by = values(create_by), update_time = values(update_time), update_by = values(update_by)
mapper.update:
update rider_schedule
schedule_id = #{scheduleId},
worktime_id = #{worktimeId},
employee_id = #{employeeId},
work_start_time = #{workStartTime},
work_end_time = #{workEndTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
where id = #{id}
